Description.Text:
The Hotel Valentin Star which will be Adults Only in 2012 is located in the South East of the tranquil island of Menorca. It is situated in Calan Bosch, in front of the salt water lake which gave its name to the area. The especially exposed location, only 8 km to the former capital of the island (Ciutadella) and between the beaches of Calan Bosch (250 m) and Son Xoriguer (500 m) makes this enclave an ideal place for water sports and quiet and relaxing vacations.
The Valentin Star has been completely refurbished in 2005 and changed into a modern and elegantly equipped 4 star hotel with a familiar and cozy atmosphere. The hotel has a tranquil garden area and in its center there is a swimming pool with Jacuzzi, massage showers and a beautiful terrace. On the terrace you can relax and enjoy a great number of fantastic cocktails during summery evenings meanwhile professional shows and hotel's own animation team are in charge of the entertainment at the Valentin Star.
Walking around the lake of Calan Bosch towards the beach guests have the possibility to use some of the shopping possibilities and enjoy the entertaining, stimulating and summery ambiance of the area.
ROOMS
The hotel complex disposes of a total of 208 rooms, amongst you find Double rooms and Double superior rooms distributed on only 2 floors which transmits a wide and open ambiance.
The rooms are spacious and comfortable and dispose of the following amenities:
Air condition, Ventilator at the ceiling, Direct dial telephone in the room and bath room, Satellite TV with 4 music channels, Fully equipped bath room with hair dryer, Safety deposit box with charge, Balcony or terrace and food and beverage. br />In hotel's restaurant you can enjoy a good selection for breakfast at hotel's international buffet. In addition hotel offers a wide range of plates for dinner (buffet and show cooking) with various theme eve.

The beach of Calan Bosch is situated at 250 m distance to the Hotel and it has crystal clear water and white sand. At this barrier free beach you can rent sun lounges and umbrellas. You can also enjoy one of the water sport activities offered. The sports harbour with 270 moorings is located at approx. 100 m distance to the hotel. The harbour has been awarded on various occasions the blue flag for fulfilling highest quality standards.
The beach of Son Xoriguer is located at approx. 500 m to the hotel. This beach has a little slope, tranquil water and its opening towards the ocean has a very particular form. On the left side it is very wide and advancing towards the right it gets rather small. The little rocks on the right hand side emerging from the water give the beach an even more picturesque touch. At the local beach bar you can rent umbrellas, lounges and paddleboats.
The old and former capital of the island, Ciutadella, is situated just 8 km from the hotel and surroun.

Double Double - The hotel complex disposes of a total of 208 rooms, distributed on only 2 floors which transmits a wide and open ambience.
The rooms are spacious and comfortable and dispose of the following amenities:
Air condition, ventilator at the ceiling, Direct dial telephone in the room and bath room, Satellite TV with 4 music channels, Fully equipped bath room with hair dryer, Safety deposit box with charge and Balcony or terrace.
